vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_2.sol#79-99) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 wager = wagers[msg.sender];
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play.wager (local variable @ patch_2.sol#83) shadows:
	- PoCGame.wager (function @ patch_2.sol#71-77)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_2.sol#112-116):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_2.sol#113)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_2.sol#114)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_2.sol#118-122):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(wager)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_2.sol#119)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_2.sol#120)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_2.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:

	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_2.sol#113
